title: Introducing: Dozen Draft
body:
Greek born and raised producer/songwriter [**Dozen Draft**](https://www.facebook.com/babisbozoglou) moves like a chameleon between the sparkling vintage sounds of the past. His musical quest sounds like it’s taking place in the Amazon rainforest while the wide open range in his music taste feels like natural growth throughout his songs Psych pop, tropical, world sounds, Balkan horns, dusty production and scratchy needle tunes are hugging his debut EP, **Hands**, where somewhere in the end you’ll find the liberating salvation in the mind melting psychedelic pop of **Ebony Grief** waiting to be heard.

**Hands EP** is out now on his [bandcamp page](http://dozendraft.bandcamp.com/).

\[soundcloud url=”https://api.soundcloud.com/tracks/124823904″ params=”color=ff6600&auto\_play=false&show\_artwork=true” width=”100%” height=”166″ iframe=”true” /\]
